title: Stormy Weather
description: In the spirit of her best-selling picture book No Matter What comes another warm, snuggly picture book from Debi Gliori.Â  As a mama fox tucks her baby into bed, she soothes his nighttime fears of the storm outside his window with the promise of watching over him while he sleeps, just like all other baby animals around the world. The adorable illustrations and lilting rhyme will help see any child through the stormiest of weather or the darkest of nights.
author: Debi Gliori
